You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image features an aircraft flying above a bay with numerous sailboats in the water. Below the bay, there is a cityscape with tall buildings and a notable bridge connecting both sides. The sky is clear blue with no clouds, and the lighting suggests daytime with possibly late afternoon sun. No people or ground vehicles are visible. The focus is on the relationship between the sky, the aircraft, the waterway, and the city in the background.
